bibl.title: Davenport v. . Application for Writ of Habeas Corpus
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court of Washington Territory, Second Judicial District

div1.p: In the District Court of the Second Judicial of Washington Territory, holding terms at Tacoma in and for Pierce County.
---------------------------------------- : In the Matter of the application of : Writ of Stephen Davenport : HABEAS CORPUS for Writ of Habeas Corpus : ------------------------------------------:
The United States of America and the Territory of Washington, to J.F. SHEEHAN, Sheriff of Jefferson County, W.T. GREETING:-

We command you that you have the body of Stephen Davenport by you imprisoned and detained, as it is averrod together with the time and cause of such imprisonment and detention, by whatsoever name said Stephen Davenport shall be called or charged before Hon.Frank Allvn, Judge of the District Court of the Second Judicial District of the Territory of Washington holding terms at Tacoma in and for Pierce County, at Tacoma on the 17th day of October, at 3 o'clock p.m. of said day, to do and receive what shall then and there by considered concerning the said Stephen Davenport.
And have you then and there this writ.
WITNESS my hand and seal as the C1 of said Court this the 13th. day October A.D. 1888.
A. Reeces Ayres, C By To. Ceberd
